resources.string: Fantastic! You are paying much less rent than estimated rent range. You\'ve found an excellent deal!
Great! Your rent is on the lower end of the estimated rent range. It\'s a good rate, but there might still be room for negotiation to get an even better deal.
Hmm… Your rent is within the average rent range for similar properties. It’s on the higher side so make sure to check other options to ensure you\'re getting the best deal.
On no! You are paying on the higher end of the estimated rent range. It might be worth negotiating with your landlord or looking at other properties to find a better deal.
The rent is significantly lower than expected, indicating a favorable deal.
The rent falls on the lower end of the spectrum, reflecting a standard market rate.
The rent is within the average range for similar properties, suggesting potential room for negotiation.
The rent is on the higher end of the estimated rent range, consider negotiating or exploring other property options.
